price: Àwọn àǹfààní àti ohun mímu tún wà fún wọn nínú rẹ̀. Ṣé wọn kò níí dúpẹ́ ni?
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfiʿu wamashāribu afalā yashkurūna
